programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam kicks off the 2024 season with the Superstar Challenge in Anaheim, California. Sixteen of the sport’s biggest stars compete on two teams through three competitions. Krysten Anderson looks to lead Team Neon to victory against Bari Musawwir’s Team Nitro. Who will be named the Most Valuable Driver? Find out when Monster Jam brings this exciting team format to Angel Stadium.

programme.desc: In an epic series finale, Arena Championship Series West heads to the Vibrant Arena in Moline, Illinois as Krysten Anderson looks to lead Grave Digger to the Overall Event Championship in one last thrilling showdown with El Toro Loco’s Elvis Lainez.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: In the Stadium Championship Series Red finale, Series Champion, Adam Anderson looks to finish strong and lead Grave Digger to his 10th event win of the season. Tom Meents, Bryce Kenny, Kayla Blood, and Todd LeDuc battle it out to finish in the Top-5 of the Red Series.
